title: 12/25: Waiver Wire - Who's Resting Players? (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
The Fantasy Grinch makes an appearance on today's show! We start with the playoff scenarios and which teams might be resting players, plus big news you need to know. Then it's on to our Waiver Wire priorities (6:40). Are C.J. Anderson and Damien Williams too risky given the uncertainty of Todd Gurley and Spencer Ware? Do the NYJ guys have good matchups this week? There are also a lot of players who are barely owned that could have good games this week ... A sneak peak at the Waiver Wire at each position (17:44) and a recap of KC-SEA (27:35) and DEN-OAK (31:00) ... Waiver Wire QBs (35:16) including Nick Foles and Josh Allen, RBs (39:30) including Brian Hill and Jeff Wilson, WRs (46:02) including the BUF guys and Jordy Nelson, TEs (50:55) including C.J. Uzomah and Chris Herndon, plus DSTs and Kickers ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Looking to win a championship with a Waiver Wire pickup? We've got a bunch of names for Week 17 on today's show.
